meanings.definition: The act of interfering or the process of interfering.
meanings.sent1: The interference of the noisy neighbors disrupted the peace in the apartment building.
meanings.sent2: The interference of the radio signals caused static on the television.
meanings.sent3: The interference of the mischievous squirrel stealing birdseed made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The interference of the storm clouds blocked the sunlight from reaching the garden.
meanings.sent5: The interference of the traffic made it hard to hear the speaker at the outdoor event.

meanings.definition: The action of interfering with something.
meanings.sent1: Her interference in the project caused delays in the timeline.
meanings.sent2: The interference of the hackers compromised the security of the website.
meanings.sent3: The interference of the curious cat knocking over the vase startled everyone.
meanings.sent4: The interference of the strong winds blew away the picnic blanket.
meanings.sent5: The interference of the construction noise made it difficult to concentrate.

meanings.definition: The act of interfering with the outcome or course especially of a condition or process.
meanings.sent1: The interference of the referee affected the final score of the game.
meanings.sent2: The interference of the chemicals altered the results of the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The interference of the playful puppy chasing its tail entertained the children.
meanings.sent4: The interference of the unexpected phone call interrupted the meeting.
meanings.sent5: The interference of the bright lights blinded the drivers on the road.
